metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1839 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
modules/chef.py in SaltStack before 2014.7.4 does not properly handle files in /tmp.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-1839` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

salt-api - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-cloud - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-common - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-master - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-minion - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-proxy - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-ssh - 2015.8.8+ds-1
salt-syndic - 2015.8.8+ds-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: debian> Vulnerable code only present in experimental version; introduced in 2014.7.0

criterions.comment: salt package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2015.8.8+ds-1').
